price: 24 Les élus du Paradis jouiront, ce Jour-là, d’un séjour plus agréable et d’une plus douce retraite.
arabic: أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡرٞ مُّسۡتَقَرّٗا وَأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: aṣḥābu al-janati yawma-idhin khayrun mus'taqarran wa-aḥsanu maqīlan
